name: geometry monster (http://gaspergg1.itch.io/)
description:
geometry monster (http://gaspergg1.itch.io/) is a game developed by http://gaspergg1.itch.io/. It came out on 29-08-2020.
You can play geometry monster (http://gaspergg1.itch.io/) on PC, macOS, Linux and Android. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
